text: Masters of the Sea (German: Herren der Meere) is a 1922 Austrian silent adventure movie directed by Alexander Korda and based on the novel The Pirates by Ernest Vajda. It stars Victor Varconi, María Corda, Dylan Vanas, Tibor Lubinszky, Gyula Szőreghy and distributed by Sascha-Film. The film was released on 3 February 1922 in Austria. ==Other websites== * Category:1922 adventure movies Category:Austrian adventure movies Category:Austrian silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Alexander Korda
title: Masters of the Sea
